jArgs - Command line done simple

Download

Just like curl and so many programs, you too can make awesome command line syntax.

jArgs is a very simple way for you to extract information from
command line arguments. Built in help function. Default values. Integers. Booleans. Floats. Doubles.

Example:

Check out PingPlus to see an open source project that uses jArgs.

Crypter now uses jArgs to work.
